videoID.label: Video ID
videoID.description: The ID of the YouTube video e.g. 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m6nSXC938Ws' ID: 'm6nSXC938Ws'

customWidth.label: Custom Width
customWidth.description: When you selected custom size this value will be applied. Enter only numbers without unit.

customHeight.label: Custom Height
customHeight.description: When you selected custom size this value will be applied. Enter only numbers without unit.

showInfo.label: Show Video Info
showInfo.description: Shows video information which are displayed at the top of the player

showcontrols.label: Show Controls
showcontrols.description: Shows the controls at the bottom of player

autohide.label: Autohide Controls
autohide.description: Hides the controls at the bottom of player when they're not used

autoplay.label: Autoplay Video
autoplay.description: Start playing the video at the point of time the video is loaded
